Text: It's the main movie only, which is compresseed to about 60 % of original size. I think the quality is OK on a 42" screen, but its up to each of you do judge. At least it is for free.

Apparently, the retail DVD was made from a really crappy source (almost VHS quality).

Refer to this -- http://imdb.com/title/tt0093389/board/nest/72474496

So when you watch this - it's might be crap. It's not the encoder's fault.

Gonna have to wait till they release a better & proper retail version... or try to catch it on tv/cable.

>RoNxXx
Criterion's brand new 4-disc edition of this epic is already available for preorder. I think it's going to be a must have.
